text:
<@UFBNA9K9A> Sure, I've setup a very minimal POC; <http://HubSpot-developers-1vgx9ll-8499062.hs-sites.com/forms-api-poc>
It just sends the three inputs, plus the hutk cookie value and the current page id.
As you can see it succesfully submits the form data, but in the form submission I get "Unavailable" for the Conversion page
If you want access to the portal let me know (it's a sandbox)
Hi guys! anyone using the v3 PHP sdk? Anyone at HubSpot wants to talk about it?

Hey guys, is there any way to add the description to the properties that you upload via an api call to a custom object on creation. We want to have a description for all the properties for clarities sake, but I don't want to manually add the description for each property for every client we add this custom object to?
